narrative_note: 50-year-old Female seen in outpatient clinic for lipid management. History: hypertension; overweight. Assessment: hyperlipidemia. Plan: start Atorvastatin 20 mg daily on 2025-06-06; counsel on diet/exercise; repeat lipid panel in ~10–12 weeks. Not eligible for cohort due to: Clinical: eGFR < 30 mL/min/1.73 m².
